content: size head circumference approx 22 56 cm materials 2 skeins of big merino drops 100 % merino 50g/82 yards 75 meters or other aran weight yarn that knits up to gauge 4 mm/us 6 circular needles marker tapestry needle gauge 20 sts and 28 row = 4 inches in main pattern abbreviations k knit p purl st/s stitch/stitches kfb knit into the front and back of the stitch k2tog knit two stitches together p2tog purl two stitches together 1 all rights reserved this patterm is for personal non-commercial use only instructions cast on 80 sts join to work in the round being careful not to twist the sts and place marker for the beginning of the round brim rounds 1-13 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end of round pattern rounds 14 -15 k to end of round rounds 16 -17 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end of round repeat rounds 14 17 eight times for a total of 49 row round 50 51 k to end of round round 52 *k2 p2tog repeat from * to end of round 60 sts round 53 *k2 p repeat from * to end of round round 54 *k2tog k repeat from * to end of round 40 sts round 55 k to end of round round 56 k2tog to end of round 20 sts round 67 k2tog to end of round 10 sts cut yarn and pull through last 10 sts on the needles weave in all ends 2 all rights reserved this patterm is for personal non-commercial use only
